🧮 Standard Problem 3

“Try to solve it using only elementary school knowledge!”

There are two containers, A and B: Container A has 200g of 12% salt solution Container B has 300g of 8% salt solution

Step 1: Transfer 100g of solution from A to B

Step 2: Then transfer 100g of the (new) solution from B back to A

What is the final concentration (%) of salt in container A?

📝 Hint

- Add the number of apples in each box.

- Simple addition!
